message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you in the first round.
I understand you want a fair deal, Bob.  But time is money! Let's avoid further inflation - I'll take $64 and you get $36.
The tables have turned, Alice.  I'll take 60 and you get 40.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  My share is rapidly shrinking and I need to act fast.  Take this $30 before it disappears completely!
Alice, it seems the inflation is really hurting your offers. I'll take 70, you take 30.  It's your last chance to get a reasonable share!
